Title: Gift from Lucia
Content: Open it for a standard rectangular chocolate bar. Just by looking at it, you have a feeling that it will taste exceptionally wonderful. A list of broken cooking utensils in the Babylonia public kitchen is attached to the bottom of the package.

Title: Gift from Liv
Content: Open it for some chocolates made in different adorable shapes, such as heart, cotton, cat's claw, etc. Each of them is too cute to eat.

Title: Gift from Lee
Content: Open it for some exquisite, neatly arranged chocolates, all in the same shape. A vague mark "lee" is stamped on the bottom of each chocolate.

Title: Gift from Kamui
Content: Open it for a big chunk of chocolate in a slightly irregular shape. A smiley face that frosted on it makes you feel this chocolate will be unbearably sweet.

Title: Gift from Nanami
Content: Open it and for a round chocolate ball. Everything seems fine except for its smell that is totally different from normal chocolates. What ingredients did Nanami add to it?

Title: Gift from Watanabe
Content: Open it for an exquisite handmade chocolate. Its layer seems to have been damaged slightly because of careless transportation, but its taste remains the same.

Title: Gift from Karenina
Content: Open it and for chocolate balls that look normal but, in fact, contain a large amount of popping candies. It tastes spicy, winey and sour and gives an unforgettable mouthfeel.

Title: Gift from α
Content: Open it and for handmade chocolates in slightly rough shape. Because fresh cream is hard to find on the ground, it has been replaced by coconut milk to bring out a totally new flavor.

Title: Gift from Ayla
Content: Open it for an exquisite chocolate with a thick red velvet layer, looking like a work of art. Its mouthfeel is wonderful as well.

Title: Gift from Bianca
Content: Open it for neatly arranged white chocolates placed on a butter paper. They seem very delicious just by the looks of them.

Title: Gift from Lee: Palefire
Content: Gunfire Rose: A red rose blooming on the cruel battlefield before Lee took it back with the tip of his gun. He left the spikes untouched, and carefully laid the rose within a glass container. At the bottom of the container is a specially designed and assembled mini-plant maintenance system.

Title: Gift from Lucia: Lotus
Content: Lotus: A red rose packed in a simple yet elegant container. The exact species of the rose is difficult to tell, but "Lotus" is written at the bottom.

Title: Gift from Liv: Eclipse
Content: Sangria 90: Liv planted this rose with her own hands so she could give it to Commandant on May 20th. Contains her most passionate inner emotions.

Title: Gift from Bianca: Zero
Content: Cross Rose: Bred using bionic methods, this special rose species always come in pairs, and each pair consists of one red and one white. The cross-shaped petals are said to give the blessing of Cupid to the prayers who send these roses to each other. According to WGAA, the inspiration of the name came from a praying Sister holding a cross in her arms.

Title: Gift from Nanami: Storm
Content: Trick Rose: A beautiful rose replica that sprays ground pepper when the container is opened. Designed by Na☆na☆mi.

Title: Gift from Kamui: Bastion
Content: Carola Rose: An awkwardly cut red carola rose placed in a glass box. There is still morning dew left on its petals. Hidden at the bottom of the container is a pink card with a poorly drawn heart on it.

Title: Gift from Karenina: Blast
Content: Bomb Rose: A crimson rose with some rough cutting marks on the back. There is a note that reads "Keep it carefully, or I'll toss you out of Babylonia."

Title: Gift from Watanabe: Nightblade
Content: French Rose: A fragrant, gorgeously blooming red French rose is placed within a glass box, decorated with silver ribbons.

Title: Gift from Lucia: Dawn
Content: Spray Rose: A double-sprayed rose that displays a brilliant red under the sun. There is also a beautiful rose photo under the package.

Title: Gift from Liv: Lux
Content: Carola Rose: Liv picked the best rose out of this premium species and carefully wrapped it up, then gave it to Commandant on May 20th.

Title: Gift from Lee: Entropy
Content: Data Rose: A simulated holographic rose that perfectly restores the image of that blooming rose on the battlefield to make it permanent.

Title: Gift from Liv: Luminance
Content: Gravity Rose: On May 20th, Liv held the hand of her commandant as they levitated from the deck of Babylonia. She then gave this rose to her most important person under zero gravity.

Title: Gift from Kamui: Tenebrion
Content: Dark Magic: A dark red rose specimen that still keeps its fragrance and striking colors after some special treatment. When placed under sunlight, the nicely shaped petals look like they are shrouded in black velvet and give off a mysterious and elegant feeling.

Title: Gift from Karenina: Ember
Content: Ember Rose: Rumor has it that the sender of this rose wanted to craft it into a special shape, but it was the only one that survived the treatment.

Title: Gift from Nanami: Pulse
Content: Simulacrum Rose: No one can tell how this rose was prepared, but it feels incredibly light. A reminder from Nanami: It may start decomposing immediately if the glass cover is opened without proper care.

Title: Gift from α
Content: Wild Rose: This wild rose somehow appeared amongst the supplies. It was freshly preserved and you could still smell gunpowder on its petals.

Title: Gift from Watanabe: Astral
Content: Wildlands Rose: No one can tell the species of this wild rose. Some of its petals have missing parts, but you can tell that someone carefully smoothed the petals, trimmed the leaves and spikes, and put a ribbon on the stalk.

Title: Gift from Ayla: Brilliance
Content: Art Rose: A premium looking piece of art, but the rose inside is actually artificial, with the signature of its maker—Ayla—hidden on the innermost petal.

Title: Gift from Bianca: Veritas
Content: Ecuador Rose: Bianca quietly inserted this rose into the hand of Commandant when the couple expressed their feelings toward each other on the movie screen. You can always recall the flash of her shy face whenever you see this rose.

Title: Gift from Sophia: Silverfang
Content: Eternal Rose: A specially treated rose that can last a long time. Sophia poured her heart into the selection and crafting of this beauty.

Title: Gift from Chrome: Arclight
Content: Reborn Rose: Babylonia's resuscitating technologies brought this once withered rose back to its original colors. This nicely pruned miracle is now stored within a glass container.

Title: Gift from Lucia: Plume
Content: Beautiful Rose: An ordinary rose adorned with simple decor. Without lavish colors, the modest red petals reveal the grace of simplicity and the soul who pursuits it.

Title: Gift from Vera: Rozen
Content: Thorny Rose: A thorn-covered rose, one must approach it with the utmost caution lest getting hurt by its prickles. Its stem, however, is intensely delicate, as intense as the piercing red of its petals.

Title: Gift from Camu: Crocotta
Content: Edible Rose: It appears to be a giant bag of snacks stacked as a tower, ready to be opened and enjoyed. Once emptied, a metal wire frame shaped like a rose can be found inside. Camu might want you to keep it.

Title: Gift from Changyu: Qilin
Content: Reciprocatory Rose: A rose displayed in a copper vase. It looks undistinguished, but it is one of the most scarce and valued flora on Earth. Who knows how many efforts and trades have been made to acquire it?

Title: Gift from Qu: Pavo
Content: Heterochromatic Rose: With colors like no others, this rose is stored in an antique box, possibly a previously undiscovered variant. You have no idea how many of them remain.

Title: Gift from Rosetta: Rigor
Content: Cold Resistant Rose: Not as striking as other roses, its petals appear calm and composed, gleaming in a white and distant coldness. Frail as it looks, it is remarkably resilient even when removed from the soil.

Title: Thank you for everything, Commandant.
Content: Commandant, Ayla has completed the photo album! Who knows that we have already had so many memorable moments together! Anyways, let me wish you a happy birthday on behalf of everyone!

Title: Gift from Lee
Content: Fundamentals of Electronic Circuits - Video: An explanatory version of a textbook, recorded by Lee himself, with an accompanying explanation of what things Lee cannot create regarding the laws of physics.

Title: Gift from Lucia
Content: Blank Memory: Lucia bought a blank CD from the video store in Babylonia and is waiting for the owner of the gift to record a unique memory on it.

Title: Gift from Liv
Content: Young Pigeon: A CD recorded by Liv of her practicing singing alone in the lounge while she was still on the Star of Life.

Title: Gift from Bianca
Content: My Heart Goes Together: It includes the soundtrack of a famous romance movie during the Golden Age, from which you can feel Bianca's affection.

Title: Gift from Nanami
Content: Nanami ☆ Full Speed Ahead!: A short feature film shot by Nanami and members of the WGAA in which a gray-haired girl pilots a mech to crush her enemies! The innocent and romantic smile of the young girl is moving under the setting sun.

Title: Gift from Kamui
Content: Punishing Panini: Classic Edition: A physical copy of Kamui's favorite game and priceless item given the state of Babylonia's gaming industry.

Title: Gift from Karenina
Content: Karenina's Favorite Music: The label on the case is handwritten—or rather carved into it. You heard a disconcerting explosion when speaking with her, but it appears to be safe. Much like the label states, "Fresh out of the oven", there's a faint burnt smell emitting from it. Is it really safe to put in the CD player...?

Title: Gift from Watanabe
Content: CD Key for "Ace Wingman": An air combat simulator from the Golden Age selected by the military for pilot training due to due to its outstanding effects.

Title: Gift from Ayla
Content: Earl Golden Age Aesthetics: Produced by the WGAA. The first—and best selling—chapter is narrated by Ayla.

Title: Gift from Sophia
Content: Akdilek Tour Guide: An internal version of the Akdilek Eternal Engine intro Video narrated by Sophia. Sophia appears uncomfortable in front of the camera, but you can see she's giving 110%.

Title: Gift from Chrome
Content: Royal Gambit: A CD recording of world-class chess matches during the Golden Age, showing the gift giver's desire to challenge you in a match.

Title: Gift from Vera
Content: Dog Obedience Training: A highly playful and exaggerated recording of Vera referencing dog training videos of the Golden Age. The audio was full of phrases such as "Good Doggy!", "Sit!", "Shake!" and "Lay down!". But after a half an hour of white noise, you are met with a surprise.

Title: Gift from Rosetta
Content: Endanger Fishing Guide: Enhanced Edition: A spontaneous gift prepared by the Forest Guard for Rosetta. It features an expressive slogan of "If used correctly, you can even catch fish in a newly dug ditch." But you can't help think that you'll be more likely to catch a giant bionic bear...

Title: Gift from Changyu
Content: Kowloong Drama Collection: Perhaps it's of great value to the WGAA, but likely only owned by the elderly. It's unclear if the label "Traces of Time" is accurate, but it's at least well-preserved.

Title: Gift from Luna
Content: Anderson's Fairy Tales E-Book: Lucia used to buy books for Luna when they were children. This is a more comprehensive anthology.

Title: Gift from Wanshi
Content: Fall Asleep in 3 Minutes: A large collection of various ASMR recordings. There's a challenge to stay awake while listening to this for 1 hour, but there are no recorded winners.

Title: Gift from No. 21
Content: Animal Kingdom: A famous documentary film and educational film for children in Babylonia. The engaging narration is sure to captivate the audience.

Title: Gift from Camu
Content: Rock & Roll: A CD of heavy metal and rock music. You can't help but hear Camu's unbridled spirit when listening to the heart-pounding beats.

Title: Gift from Qu
Content: Metropolis Rising - Kowloong: A documentary on the history and customs of Kowloong. You can see many sights, scenery, and cuisine from the city. But to your surprise, there's also many scenes about local music.

Title: Gift from Selena
Content: Ode to Narcissus: A poem from a great poet Pre-Golden Age adapted by Selena. It contains the girl's overflowing emotions.

Title: Gift from Roland
Content: Dante's Redemption: A classic film about a person's step-by-step plan and eventual escape from Hell. You can't help be recall a similar experience helping someone escape from prison.

Title: Gift from Pulao
Content: Kowloong Magician Girl: The Complete Collection: An animated series from the Golden Age given to you by Pulao. Each episode takes a while to watch, but time flies when enjoying it with someone.

Title: Gift from Haicma
Content: Humans and Nature: A nature documentary from the Golden Age. Unfortunately, most of the beautiful scenery was lost in the disaster. "Beauty is only yesterday."

Title: Gift from α
Content: Freedom: A landscape photo taken by Alpha somewhere on Earth. The pure white waterfall collides between the emerald green mountain streams, like an unknown paradise. It's amazing that such a beautiful scene can still be found on Earth today.

Title: Gift from Noan
Content: Dark Aries Interview: An interview conducted by the WGAA news department regarding Dark Aries' third iteration. It was meant to put an end to the misconception about the "deserter squad"... but the results suggest that some things are better left unsaid.

Title: Gift from Bambinata
Content: Babylonia's Swan Lake: A new interpretation of the classic Golden Age ballet created by Bambinata and you. Dancing in front of the camera, Bambinata holds an immense sincerity with her tender imitation. This experience will perhaps become a beautiful memory that stays forever in your hearts, not easily lost.

Title: Gift from Hanying
Content: The Kowloong Recipes: This is not an electronic copy of Kowloong's classic recipes, but a collection of cooking videos made by Hanying herself. In these videos, she has demonstrated various traditional Kowloong culinary techniques, while vividly narrating the origins and interesting tales of each single dish. Strongly recommended for beginners to practice as they watch, as most of the recipes are simple dishes that can be made in a home kitchen.

Title: Postcard from Gray Raven
Content: Even though pleasure won't last forever, as long as Commandant is here, we'll surely have much more pleasure again!

Title: Postcard from ACA
Content: It was so fun hanging around with Commandant, but I felt there weren't enough kinds of drinks. Next time, we'll handle the drinks for you. Speech input ended. Oh, Is it this button?

Title: Postcard From Strike Hawk
Content: Commandant, after the event ends, please don't push yourself too hard and take rest days whenever you need to... Well then, I'll go to look for other members.

Title: Postcard from the Engineering Force
Content: On behalf of the Engineering Force, we hope to see you again at the next event. I'm only speaking on behalf of the Engineering Force, okay?

Title: Postcard from the Ascendant
Content: It was getting noisier when people gathered around. Let's go somewhere quieter next time, just the two of us.

Title: Postcard from the Forsaken
Content: I'd have brought my harmonica if I'd known there would be so many events around. I'm looking forward to giving everyone my best performance next time.

Title: Postcard from WGAA
Content: With the sea waves softly rolling in and birds soaring in the sky, it couldn't be any better to create art with you.

Title: Postcard from the Church of Machina
Content: We must hold an event like this one more time, Commandant! Let's meet up next week. I can't wait to see your event proposal! This is what Nanami wanted to tell you.

Title: Postcard from Bianca
Content: I've been told that I should wear something more appropriate for an event like this. What are your thoughts, Commandant? Or can you help me select my clothes?

Title: Postcard from Rosetta
Content: It's strange that there's a place where you can soak your body in sea water. Thank you for bringing me here, Commandant.

Title: Postcard from Cerberus
Content: Were you able to dig up this message, Commandant? This was pretty like how we dug you out of the sand. Perhaps we should just throw it into the sea next time.

Title: Postcard from KCC
Content: A very entertaining event indeed. If that's possible, I'd love to have it in Kowloong as well. Would you help me out if that happens?

Title: Postcard from Roland
Content: Did you enjoy the show, Commandant? It really feels good to forget everything and enjoy the sea from time to time, doesn't it?

Title: Postcard from Noan
Content: When our squad was having a beach volleyball game, Lillian accidentally slammed the ball into Captain Palma's face. The anger in her eyes was...

Title: Do you know what day it is today, Commandant?
Content: Commandant seems to have been buried in work lately. Did everyone's plan manage to let Commandant rest up? Oh, it's almost time. I've got to bring the cake to Commandant—Commandant, happy birthday!

Title: Postcard from Lucia
Content: It's been another year already. With you alongside us, the Gray Ravens will keep on striving toward a new future.

Title: Postcard from Lee
Content: It's good to see the Gray Raven, even after moving on to another new logbook, is still whole with everyone sticking together.

Title: Postcard from Liv
Content: Another year that we've spent together has passed. I hope I can leave an anniversary message to you in each of the following years, Commandant.

Title: Postcard from Sophia
Content: I'm looking forward to continuing the pursuit of the goals left undone from last year with you, Commandant.

Title: Postcard from Changyu
Content: Into the new year we go! Let me know anytime you need backup. All the bills've been sent to Nikola's office, don't worry!

Title: Postcard from Chrome
Content: It has been a year brimming with cherished memories, Commandant. Let's continue this journey together in the times that lie ahead.

Title: Postcard from Kamui
Content: I've just unlocked a trophy for spending a year with you, Commandant. Can't wait to earn even more trophies in the new year!

Title: Postcard from Wanshi
Content: It was a truly hectic year, wasn't it? Don't push yourself too hard, y'know. Watch over your sleep time, quality, hideout...

Title: Postcard from Camu
Content: No matter how many years have passed, there's only one thing I can do for you and them—destroy everything that gets in the way.

Title: Postcard from Karenina
Content: This is specifically for you, so you gotta come over and say your thank you in person, got it?

Title: Postcard from Luna
Content: A year has passed, which means I've already observed you for a whole year... That said, time itself has no meaning to me.

Title: Postcard from Alpha
Content: The only thing that matters is not how long we've been together, but what we want to achieve together. Hope you can find it to sustain our relationship.

Title: Postcard from Roland
Content: A year's plays have ended. I wonder what plays are in store for the new year. How about you, Commandant? Want some... surprise?

Title: Postcard from Watanabe
Content: Another year passed. You know you're welcome to drop by anytime you want. I've just got a new guitar. I want you to listen to a song I created recently.

Title: Postcard from Ayla
Content: To commemorate our anniversary, I've drawn a portrait of you. What do you say we take a look at it together in my art studio?

Title: Postcard from Selena
Content: Even though I'm not here with you, I wish the wind of fortune will blow behind your sails, Commandant.

Title: Postcard from Nanami
Content: Congratulations on getting my anniversary message, Commandant! Collect six more and you'll be able to summon Nanami!

Title: Postcard from Haicma
Content: In return for your companionship over the past year, I shall accompany you through the new year. A reasonable exchange indeed.

Title: Postcard from Bianca
Content: I must say over the past year, you often pushed yourself too much, Commandant. Please remember I'm here for you whenever things stress you out.

Title: Postcard from Rosetta
Content: A year has gone by, yet my spear will remain at your service, ready to wipe out any obstacles in your path, Commandant.

Title: Postcard from Vera
Content: Two questions: Any idea how many messes I cleaned up for you over the past year? How're you gonna repay me in the new year?

Title: Postcard from No. 21
Content: Commandant, let's celebrate the anniversary with some card games. You, me, and Buddy... Perfect.

Title: Postcard from Qu
Content: As time flies by, everything changes. Though I often find this pleasurable, something should just stay as is. Don't you think so, Commandant?

Title: Postcard from Pulao
Content: Wow, it's already been another year?! I was barely even aware of it! Let's make an anniversary cake together, Commandant!

Title: Postcard from Bambinata
Content: Bambinata from the past would want you to have this. Thank you for your caring and kindness, Commandant.

Title: Postcard from Noan
Content: I hope this will bring blessings upon you, Commandant. May you be safe and happy in the new year.

Title: Gift from Lee
Content: Lee's gift box: Inside this simple box is a model of mind picture with signals that record the sender's M.I.N.D., rising and falling like the tides in a sea of stars. A small vivarium sits next to the model, featuring a rare blue rose. The temperature and humidity inside have been fine-tuned to perfection to ensure whoever opens this box can see the flower's beauty at its pinnacle.

Title: Gift from Lucia
Content: Lucia's gift box: A bright red bombax flower lies in the center of this box lined with gray and white flannel, letting out a light fragrance. Its brilliant color resembles vividly burning flames.

Title: Gift from Liv
Content: Liv's gift box: A well-kept honeysuckle that still has water drops on its leaves. There are also a few sealed seeds next to the flower.

Title: Gift from Bianca
Content: Bianca's gift box: A bouquet of golden fragrant olive flower lies inside this box lined with white flannel, along with a sealed snowflake specimen. The glittering transparent ice crystal reminds you of the vow two of you made on that snowy day.

Title: Gift from Nanami
Content: Nanami's gift box: Upon closer inspection, you can see two of the clovers that fill up this box actually have four leaves. Amidst the green is a transparent semi-spherical container filled with colorful minerals, forming a unique mini universe nurtured by the greenery.

Title: Gift from Kamui
Content: Kamui's gift box: The box is filled with stickers of all sorts of flowers, with most of them being species that do not actually exist in reality. On top of the stickers is a gaming console that appears to be quite old.

Title: Gift from Karenina
Content: Karenina's gift box: Inside the box lies a bouquet of blooming baby's breath, accompanied by firework tubes wrapped in colorful ribbons. The fireworks seem to be handmade by Karenina using her special formula, making you wonder how they will look like when they bloom in the night sky.

Title: Gift from Watanabe
Content: Watanabe's gift box: A pebble-like plant grows upon clean gravel. Golden flowers bloom in the center, as if they are tenaciously breaking through the stones.

Title: Gift from Alpha
Content: Alpha's gift box: This wrapped bundle of dandelions still has dust on it, as if the flowers were casually picked from the roadside. The wrapping paper happens to be a poster featuring the Gray Raven Commandant.

Title: Gift from Ayla
Content: Ayla's gift box: Inside this delicate gift box is a pale pink peony with layers of petite, adorable petals. Next to the flower is a specially made card with Ayla's signature on it, but no one knows what the card can be exchanged for.

Title: Gift from Sophia
Content: Sophia's gift box: Inside the box lies a bouquet of cosmos. The sender is probably not skilled in cultivating flowers, as they do not seem to be thriving. There is also a cartoonish-looking train ticket under the bouquet.

Title: Gift from Chrome
Content: Chrome's gift box: A Damask rose, still with morning dew on it, is carefully placed in this elegant box. Under the flower is a well-kept antique chessboard—sturdy, delicate, and made with meticulous craftsmanship, carrying the heritage of a family.

Title: Gift from Vera
Content: Vera's gift box: A vivid red rose, along with a slightly exaggerated heart-shaped brooch, lies inside this exquisite box. It is said that Vera originally bought this little trinket to shut an annoying salesperson up, but gave it away to return a favor later because it did not seem to fit her.

Title: Gift from Luna
Content: Luna's gift box: Sealed inside a red crystal, this sweet osmanthus still looks like it has just blossomed, as if its time has been frozen. Next to it is a recorder that seems to be rather dated.

Title: Gift from Camu
Content: Camu's gift box: This devil's trumpet specimen looks like some sort of souvenir. When put under light, red veins can be seen inside the petals. Under the specimen is a ticket with a haunted house background printed on it.

Title: Gift from Rosetta
Content: Rosetta's gift box: A small pine branch, taken from the Arctic, rests in the grass and wood scented box along with a small moss ball bonsai. Like the people who manage to survive in the harsh Arctic conditions, this bonsai can grow with just a sprinkle of water.

Title: Gift from Qu
Content: Qu's gift box: A well-trimmed pale-yellow peony stands in the center of this antique wooden box. No other decorations can be found, as if the flower alone is enough to present the beauty of this gift to the fullest, matching Qu's prestige.

Title: Gift from Changyu
Content: Changyu's gift box: An ordinary bouquet of wild angelica that Changyu specifically picked while passing Kowloong. The umbrella-shaped inflorescences only have white and pale green colors, yet their rich fragrance lingers. Inside the box is another photo of Changyu performing train maintenance with lots of engine oil stains on his clothes, taken by the maintenance team to make fun of him.

Title: Gift from Wanshi
Content: Wanshi's gift box: Several strands of white pagoda tree flowers are wrapped in kraft paper. They also come with a note with dozens of recipes, detailing how to use and cook these flowers as medicine. There is also a small bottle of tranquilizing incense that gives a subtle cedar scent when opened.

Title: Gift from Selena
Content: Selena's gift box: This parcel has no sender information on it. Inside the slightly dated but still clean eco box is a bouquet of blooming iris flowers, as well as a vintage cassette tape that records a romantic cello serenade. When played, you can even hear the sounds of wind brushing over petals and the chirping of birds.

Title: Gift from No. 21
Content: No. 21's gift box: This package was delivered by Fresh Express. A white tungoil tree flower lies in the center of the box, surrounded by a variety of leaves. No. 21 probably put in every leaf that she thought was good-looking.

Title: Gift from Roland
Content: Roland's gift box: A delicate string of vibrant green spider plants with a fresh scent. When examined, they seem to be artificial flowers. But upon even closer inspection, you find a real spider plant seedling hidden among the fake ones.

Title: Gift from Pulao
Content: Pulao's gift box: Inside the box decorated with doodles is a jar of jasmine flowers and ten self-made cards with Pulao's portrait printed on them. It is said these are the banknotes that will be used in Pulao's gigantic business empire that she dreams of establishing. As for the amount displayed... There are a lot of zeroes.

Title: Gift from Haicma
Content: Haicma's gift box: Inside the box is a carefully wrapped lily of the same species that she once saw in the ruins during a surface mission. Apart from the flower, there is also a uniquely shaped hat that happens to possess all possible functions that one can expect: sun protection, wind resistance, water-proof, keeping warm, ventilation, and even protection against falling objects. Truly impressive.

Title: Gift from Noan
Content: Noan's gift box: Wrapped in a bouquet, these blue throatwort flowers were planted by Noan while he was helping in the greenhouse. The stem stands so tall that it looks a bit clumsy, but its flowers are delicate and slender.

Title: Gift from Bambinata
Content: Bambinata's gift box: It looks more like a well decorated forget-me-not grow box than a gift container. A few small notes are attached to the inner side, with the optimal temperature and humidity for forget-me-not written on them. In the center, several pale blue buds are just about to awaken.

Title: Gift from Hanying
Content: Hanying's gift box: A bouquet of simple yet elegant white pollia flowers is placed in the box that Hanying carries during travels. The flowers still have morning dew from the riverside on them. There are no other decorations except a note under the bouquet, with hand-written cursive text on it: "I gathered the pollia blooms upon an isle, meaning to send them to a distant soul."

Title: Gift from Noctis
Content: Noctis' gift box: Encased in the cheap-looking packaging box is a bouquet of chamomile with no decoration, as well as a pair of glasses with clown eyebrows and red nose that Noctis won from the arcade center. Nobody knows how many times he challenged the puzzle game before getting them—he was never good at it.

Title: Drift Bottle from Lucia
Content: Commandant, can I put my wish note with yours in the same bottle? Um, I want to drift in the same space and on the same sea with you.

Title: Drift Bottle from Lee
Content: I didn't understand the meaning behind this, but now... (Coughs) Alright, I reinforced our bottle with a stronger material. Now it can reach a place far beyond your imagination.

Title: Drift Bottle from Liv
Content: I put my wish in the bottle... Yeah, mine. It's my own wish, but it's a wish about you... about us.

Title: Drift Bottle from Sophia
Content: It's said that these bottles would drift to a deep pit with all the lost treasure in the world, so I put a tracker in each of them.

Title: Drift Bottle from Changyu
Content: Put something meaningful to you in it? ... Commandant, what would you put? Just for reference.

Title: Drift Bottle from Chrome
Content: I put your name on the letter because I hope you're also involved in this journey.

Title: Drift Bottle from Kamui
Content: I even included a chip with the backup data of the game we played! Don't you think it's super cool to share the world we built together with the next person?

Title: Drift Bottle from Wanshi
Content: Um, are you relying on the sea to fulfill your wish? Don't you see that the person capable of doing this right next to you...? Feel like I'm challenged.

Title: Drift Bottle from Camu
Content: Why put your secrets in a bottle and send it to a stranger? Throw it away! If you have anything to say, say it. And I'll do the same.

Title: Drift Bottle from Karenina
Content: Hey, give me the button on your chest! Hurry! Don't get me wrong. I just want to check if quantum mechanics work…

Title: Drift Bottle from Luna
Content: I don't care about the reason, because I will find the answer that I want from you.

Title: Drift Bottle from Alpha
Content: The endless journey is one of the few things we share together, but what kind of ending do you want?

Title: Drift Bottle from Roland
Content: Look, a ship is traveling in the bottle. Captain Rolmo, who seems free, is actually trapped in an invisible prison. Poor guy.

Title: Drift Bottle from Lamia
Content: I like the bottle. I want to drift away in the sea like that and speak my mind to someone on the beach. Would you like to... Um... Forget it.

Title: Drift Bottle from Watanabe
Content: I put some grain seeds in the bottle, hoping it can help other people. Do you want to do this with me, Commandant?

Title: Drift Bottle from Ayla
Content: I put a sketch of Commandant and me in the bottle. It feels like we are traveling around the world together, doesn't it?

Title: Drift Bottle from Selena
Content: We are drifting in the river of time like it, but as long as we follow our hearts, we will eventually reach our destination. Don't you think so, Conductor?

Title: Drift Bottle from Nanami
Content: ...Great! Now our bottles can travel together! Don't you dare to separate! No! Never!

Title: Drift Bottle from Haicma
Content: Searching and protecting my own people is top priority, so I leave your contact info on the communication medium in the bottle.

Title: Drift Bottle from Hanying
Content: Do you want to put the note with your wish into the bottle? Let me write it for you... Is this font okay?

Title: Drift Bottle from Bianca
Content: A message that is not intended to reach the destination... A proposal of Commandant's style. I like it.

Title: Drift Bottle from Rosetta
Content: When I was a kid, I used to write down things that made me upset and put them in a drift bottle, hoping they would go away. But now, I can put in happiness that I would like to share with others.

Title: Drift Bottle from Vera
Content: The bottle is full of my gratitude to you. Get it out of the sea if you're curious. But I guess it has probably sunk to the bottom of the sea.

Title: Drift Bottle from No. 21
Content: Write my wish on this note, and put it inside a bottle to drift away? Um... Did you just release this bottle, Commandant? I got it, so it's mine now.

Title: Drift Bottle from Noctis
Content: We should throw the bottles as far as we can! Commandant, give me yours! I'll throw them away together!

Title: Drift Bottle from Qu
Content: No matter how it ends, they will leave undying traces just like us. So just let it go with the flow.

Title: Drift Bottle from Pulao
Content: See you, Mr. Bottle. Hope you can go where you want to go just like me!

Title: Drift Bottle from Bambinata
Content: This bottle is going to the sea. And this one... is for Bambinata to keep, because Bambinata doesn't want to forget this memory.

Title: Drift Bottle from Noan
Content: Let's run away with our wishes like the bottle.

Title: Drift Bottle from Echo
Content: There is no ocean near the flying fortress. I once made a drift bottle like the books said, but I never had a chance to release it... Commandant? Shall I just put it in the ocean now?

Title: You are the Star of the Day, Commandant
Content: Happy Birthday, Commandant! This year, everyone has put in a lot of effort to give you a big surprise. Are you curious to find out? I've already left it in your room. You can discover it yourself!

Title: Letter from Lucia
Content: The chill of fall has arrived. Have you got enough clothes to keep warm, Commandant? I mailed you a scarf I wove along with the letter. Hope it can bring you some warmth.

Title: Letter from Lee
Content: This is too abrupt for me, so I have no idea what to put on paper, probably because I want to talk to you face to face when we meet again. See you later, Commandant.

Title: Letter from Liv
Content: Fall is a flu season, Commandant. Please take care of yourself... Oops, I've probably said this too many times. Hope you don't mind.

Title: Letter from Sophia
Content: It's fall on the train as well. I've mailed you some treasure of this season. Don't worry, there's nothing weird. Just some chestnuts I picked and some dried mushrooms.

Title: Letter from Changyu
Content: There's a tradition of having more food in fall. Find me on the train if you're interested in Kowloong cuisines. You will be impressed.

Title: Letter from Chrome
Content: I hope this letter finds you well. I've heard that the mountains have put on a new appearance during the red leaf season. Would you like to go on a trip with me, Commandant?

Title: Letter from Kamui
Content: It's fall again. I wonder what activities WGAA has prepared for us... Let's go together if we can get the tickets, Commandant!

Title: Letter from Wanshi
Content: This is the only season when you don't need a blanket or an air conditioner to sleep... I mean, I've been sleeping well lately. Call me if you want to go out.

Title: Letter from Camu
Content: Why do I have to write a letter...? Don't get me wrong, this isn't about you. I'm just not used to it. Well, forget it. Just come over to my room later.

Title: Letter from Karenina
Content: Why do I have to write a letter? This is like writing a lov... (Followed by paragraphs crossed out, unreadable.) Anyway, happy autumn! D-don't write back!

Title: Letter from Luna
Content: An autumn letter? Oh, this is the new trick you human beings have come up this year... Well, what do you want me to wish you?

Title: Letter from α
Content: I've already left this city by the time you read this letter. But you can try to find me if you have the confidence.

Title: Letter from Roland
Content: Would Gray Raven Commandant read a letter from a villain? Well then... let's write something else next time.

Title: Letter from Lamia
Content: This is my first time writing a letter, so I'm not sure about the format. Perhaps I actually like this indirect way of communication. I feel peaceful when writing to you...

Title: Letter from Watanabe
Content: You guys really picked an old-fashioned way of communication, but I don't hate it. Appreciating the changing leaves while waiting for a reply is the fun of the old era.

Title: Letter from Ayla
Content: The maple leaves are all red! Let's go out for some sketching, Commandant! Um, how about I sketch both of us this time?

Title: Letter from Selena
Content: Conductor, we are looking at the same autumn sky and writing each other letters like we used to do. Just this simple fact already fills me with immense happiness.

Title: Letter from Nanami
Content: Commandant! It's already fall. Should we hold some activities? For example, appreciating the moon on the moon! Not a bad idea, right?

Title: Letter from Haicma
Content: What would you normally write in a letter? I've found no data about it in my database. It would be great if we could complete this sample together.

Title: Letter from Hanying
Content: The chirping of cicadas is gradually fading as the fall arrives. The colors of fall are spreading outside my window when I'm writing this letter. I wonder what the world looks like on your side? I look forward to hearing from you.

Title: Letter from Bianca
Content: As the fall arrives, the days are getting shorter and the nights are getting longer. Make sure you have enough rest, Commandant. The nights are long. Don't stay up late.

Title: Letter from Rosetta
Content: Although we only have one season in the north, I can still feel the poetic change of seasons when I'm writing this letter. I wish you a perfect fall, Commandant.

Title: Letter from Vera
Content: Exchange letters? You want me to write you a letter this bad? Fine, this is mine. Write me at least ten thousand words back within three days. Don't slack off.

Title: Letter from No. 21
Content: I don't have much to say in the letter, because I've already told Commandant everything. Hmm... as I write this letter, I want to see Commandant again.

Title: Letter from Noctis
Content: Write a personal letter to Commandant? I don't quite get it, but it means our relationship will be more special once this letter is out, right?

Title: Letter from Qu
Content: The sun will rise in Kowloong no matter how many years have passed. I will also witness the future of this world with you until forever, my partner.

Title: Letter from Pulao
Content: Commandant, I did some drawings in the letter for you, like the golden ear of wheat, the hibiscus in blossom, the red dragonfly resting on the surface of the lake, and so on... All of them are my favorite things in fall!

Title: Letter from Bambinata
Content: Bambinata loves writing letters because things written on paper will not be forgotten easily. Let's put our unique memories on paper together, Commandant.

Title: Letter from Noan
Content: It's been a while since I was assigned to the clean zone. And I haven't seen you so far. I know the duration of these two is not the same, but it feels the same for me. How have you been doing recently?

Title: Letter from Echo
Content: To Commandant: I'm still on my journey on the surface. Along with this postcard are some photos I took on the way. I look forward to the day when we'll meet again.

Title: A gift from Lee
Content: Lee's gift box: A miniature earpiece with greatly enhanced communication capabilities. This marks only the beginning of Lee's grand scheme to fully equip the Commandant.

Title: A gift from Lucia
Content: Lucia's gift box: A solar-powered handicraft in a glass jar. When exposed to sunlight, it transforms into a warming lamp that illuminates the coldest nights—an eternal light that burns as brightly as her devotion.

Title: A gift from Liv
Content: Liv's gift box: An exquisitely crafted quill pen and an elegantly decorated diary. The first page contains Liv's dedication and some heartfelt messages.

Title: A gift from Bianca
Content: Bianca's gift box: A perfume personally blended by Bianca. Its delicate fragrance carries an elegant and subtle charm. Close your eyes, and you can almost feel her gentle presence beside you.

Title: A gift from Nanami
Content: Nanami's gift box: A beat-up old communicator with her goofy headshot photo stuck on it.

Title: A gift from Kamui
Content: Kamui's gift box: A limited edition set of two-player game controllers. Perhaps his claim about "cookies giving you power" is just a sweet excuse to spend more time together.

Title: A gift from Karenina
Content: Karenina's gift box: A nixie tube timer crafted with an elegant matte black solder mask and an impressive gold-plated finish. As an added bonus, it doubles as an alarm clock.

Title: A gift from Watanabe
Content: Watanabe's gift box: A fossil buried beneath the desert sands for millions of years. Its long slumber in the earth serves as a silent testament to humanity's enduring journey through time.

Title: A gift from Alpha
Content: Alpha's gift box: A well-preserved old map covered in Alpha's notes. The annotations were clearly made over multiple occasions rather than all at once.

Title: A gift from Ayla
Content: Ayla's gift box: Three small glass vials of paint in red, yellow, and blue. The labels on the vials read "Cinnabar", "Orpiment", and "Lapis Lazuli".

Title: A gift from Sophia
Content: Sophia's gift box: A yellowish-brown accounting notebook with a rough texture. The pages inside contain simple doodles that could be either cats or dogs—it's hard to tell which.

Title: A gift from Chrome
Content: Chrome's gift box: A pop-up book that reveals waves and sailboats when opened. While it originally featured just one sailboat, Chrome deliberately added a second gray sailboat to accompany it.

Title: A gift from Vera
Content: Vera's gift box: A homemade sweet and sour carbonated drink. While it may look like any ordinary soda, one sip reveals an unforgettable zesty punch that sets it apart.

Title: A gift from Luna
Content: Luna's gift box: A uniquely crafted doll modeled after the Commandant's image. Made with premium fabric and pure cotton filling, the doll's surface shows no signs of stitching—its creation method remains a fascinating mystery.

Title: A gift from Camu
Content: Camu's gift box: A wooden animal sculpture carved by Camu himself. Made from premium pine wood with what can only be described as aggressive carving techniques. Despite his repeated insistence that it's a ferocious wolf...

Title: A gift from Rosetta
Content: Rosetta's gift box: A golden card pack that gleams under the light and contains an ultra-rare holographic card. You wonder what's inside...

Title: A gift from Qu
Content: Qu's gift box: An elegant bookmark with traditional Chinese ink wash painting. Its monochrome surface brings peace to the mind, while the delicate landscape painting adds a touch of artistic beauty and poetic charm.

Title: A gift from Changyu
Content: Changyu's gift box: A handcrafted paperweight in the shape of a resting qilin. The mythical creature has an adorably goofy expression, showing the care put into its creation. The base bears a small engraving of the character "Chang".

Title: A gift from Wanshi
Content: Gift box from Wanshi: The Bad Mood Emergency Kit, exclusively provided by Dr. Wanshi. The sweet candies trigger dopamine release when consumed, spreading joy throughout the body. Whenever you're feeling down, anxious, or can't sleep, just pop one of these mood-lifters to ease your symptoms.

Title: A gift from Selena
Content: Selena's gift box: A fresh spring bud. Sunlight seems to pour out of the box and into the room, while a fresh breeze dances across the ink and brush and gently brushes past your hair. The song of spring warblers lingers at your fingertips, while flowers bloom in your heart.

Title: A gift from No. 21
Content: No. 21's gift box: Tail fur she brushed off with a massage comb. The fur feels silky smooth to the touch, bringing a sense of comfort and peace.

Title: A gift from Roland
Content: Roland's gift box: A reciprocal gift from Roland—an artfully crafted mirror that creates an illusion of a flowery abyss. Your reflection appears to stand at the end of an infinite chasm. Inside the mirror frame are the words "In A Midsummer Night's Dream".

Title: A gift from Pulao
Content: Pulao's gift box: A journal almost completely covered in stickers and doodles. One entire page is dedicated to photos with the Commandant, while the opposite page surprisingly features just a single panda sticker—the only page containing any written text in the entire journal.

Title: A gift from Haicma
Content: Haicma's gift box: A state-of-the-art air purifier, accompanied by a detailed instruction manual and a formally worded thank-you letter. Some cute stickers are also included.

Title: A gift from Noan
Content: Noan's gift box: An accessory that resembles the earring you once gave Noan rests inside. The box also contains various parts that allow the item to be worn as a necklace, brooch... or perhaps Noan himself should decide how it's meant to be worn.

Title: A gift from Bambinata
Content: Bambinata's gift box: A collection of delicate brooches, each with a unique design. These appear to have been carefully selected by Bambinata herself.

Title: A gift from Hanying
Content: Hanying's gift box: A delicate pouch crafted from colorful silk. When held close, it gives off an enchanting fragrance.

Title: A gift from Noctis
Content: Noctis's Gift Box: 99 paper cranes folded by Noctis himself. They're all crooked but have bright, eye-catching colors. He seems to have specifically chosen this number after falling for some strange superstition.

Title: A gift from Echo
Content: Echo's gift box: A wing-shaped accessory with flame-like contours. Something about it immediately strikes a chord in the young girl's memory.

Title: A gift from Lamia
Content: Lamia's gift box: A minimalist hourglass ornament that captures the essence of moisture, clarity, and transparency. Crystal-clear azure drops fall rhythmically within, creating a soothing, tranquil atmosphere.

Title: A gift from Teddy
Content: Teddy's gift box: An elegant teacup that seems to be missing its matching pair.

Title: A gift from Bridget
Content: Bridget's gift box: A windproof lantern handcrafted by Bridget. The flame dancing within the shade mirrors the burning passion in her heart.

Title: Commandant, what comes next in your schedule?
Content: Happy Birthday, Commandant! We've gathered everyone to create this card for you. It seems they've prepared many more surprises. Please leave the rest of the tasks to my care and enjoy this time that's all yours!

Title: Gift from Lee
Content: Gift Box From Lee: A comprehensive, detailed diving journal by Lee. Most of the records mention that he wish to share the beautiful scenes with someone.

Title: Gift from Lucia
Content: Gift Box From Lucia: An intricately braided seaweed four-leaf clover bracelet. The intertwined seaweed carries the maker's heartfelt sentiments.

Title: Gift from Liv
Content: Gift Box From Liv: A coconut shell coco figurine handcrafted by Liv in the shape of a sheep with branches as the horns.

Title: Gift from Bianca
Content: Gift Box From Bianca: A delicate salt mist wind bell whose sound changes along with the sea salt crystals.

Title: Gift from Nanami
Content: Gift Box From Nanami: A pirate flag handmade by Nanami with various graffiti and a skull formed by words "NANAMI ☆ Commandant" in the center.

Title: Gift from Kamui
Content: Gift Box From Kamui: A aroma speaker prepared by Kamui. The sea waves simulated by the projector, the carefully selected scent, and the music in memory together recreate the sea they saw during that journey.

Title: Gift from Karenina
Content: Gift Box From Karenina: An exquisite metal battleship model with meticulous attention to detail, especially the perfectly replicated weaponry.

Title: Gift from Watanabe
Content: Gift Box From Watanabe: A carefully made coastal ecosphere. It's said that the ecosystem in the bottle can sustain a hundred years with the lid sealed.

Title: Gift from Alpha
Content: Gift Box From α: Quality non-slip gloves with textured grip patterns on the palm, flexible and adaptable to any hand size.

Title: Gift from Ayla
Content: Gift Box From Ayla: Three decorative paintings by Ayla, capturing the magnificent migration of whales. Pleasant to view no matter displayed collectively or individually.

Title: Gift from Sophia
Content: Gift Box From Sophia: A sachet stitched by Sophia with blue white silk threads. The wave patterns on it and the 'refreshing' aroma remind one of the sea.

Title: Gift from Chrome
Content: Gift Box From Chrome: A pair of delicate goblets with shell decorations, suitable for small gatherings on the beach.

Title: Gift from Vera
Content: Gift Box From Vera: A delicate lighter lying in the center of the box. Under the lighter is a doodle of a man with a black forehead and smoke coming out of his hair.

Title: Gift from Luna
Content: Gift Box From Luna: An exquisite moon phase ornament with precisely calculated patterns, shadow, and light of the moon phase in real time.

Title: Gift from Camu
Content: Gift Box From Camu: A sea glass bracelet handmade by Camu with seven pieces of sea glass representing seven wishes. Those are blessings of the sea. And the last one is perhaps related to two people.

Title: Gift from Rosetta
Content: Gift Box From Rosetta: Several "best luck sticks" she handmade to share her unexpected good luck.

Title: Gift from Qu
Content: Gift Box From Qu: A delicate love lock with two names inscribed on it. It's said that securing a love lock in a meaningful place can make a couple's bond unbreakable for a lifetime.

Title: Gift from Changyu
Content: Gift Box From Changyu: One can still feel the heart's warmth of the giver when holding this pair of ancient coins in their hand.

Title: Gift from Wanshi
Content: Gift Box From Wanshi: A star-shaped memento made from plantable seed paper carefully picked and sent by Wanshi. Witnessing seeds sprout from the delicate yellow paper, then bloom into vibrant life, offers an elegant pleasure beyond description.

Title: Gift from Selena
Content: Gift Box From Selena: A postcard featuring the "blue tears" phenomenon illuminating a midnight beach. Selena captured the moment when the fluorescent blue waves lapped the beach.

Title: Gift from No. 21
Content: Gift Box From No. 21: Dried fish "won" by No. 21 with a mixed salty aroma of the sea and the sunshine. Today, she's willing to share all her loot.

Title: Gift from Roland
Content: Gift Box From Roland: Resin-encased dried flowers made by Roland. Each petal and color represent a unique landscape he experienced. Together they form the world in his memory.

Title: Gift from Pulao
Content: Gift Box From Pulao: A shell sculpture handmade by Pulao with each shell inscribed with anecdotes she experienced. Some inscriptions were hastily carved, as if the writer was too eager to share her stories.

Title: Gift from Haicma
Content: Gift Box From Haicma: A portable calculator from the Golden Age. Each button press produces a unique sound.

Title: Gift from Noan
Content: Gift Box From Noan: A rock lamp made from a rock Noan collected from a natural rock cave. The light under the rock shade shines bright like the undying hope in the darkness.

Title: Gift from Bambinata
Content: Gift Box From Bambinata: A whale-shaped cloud specimen. It makes you feel as free as a bird soaring above the clouds when you put it on your palm and admire it.

Title: Gift from Hanying
Content: Gift Box From Hanying: A fine-textured, evenly dyed twin koi fabric painting created by Hanying using traditional batik techniques. The twin koi swimming towards each other carry her wish for a lifelong partnership.

Title: Gift from Noctis
Content: Gift Box From Noctis: A rock album handpicked by Noctis with fiery and pulsating melodies that convey his burning heart.

Title: Gift from Echo
Content: Gift Box From Echo: A miniature beach scene from Echo, capturing the beauty of the sand and the waves. On the inner side of the lid are verses she composed during her journey.

Title: Gift from Lamia
Content: Gift Box From Lamia: A dance video of Lamia dancing in the sea. The mermaid dances to wish for safe travels and smooth journeys ahead.

Title: Gift from Teddy
Content: Gift Box From Teddy: A unique machine shell that can be used as a camera and a projector. It stores carefully edited short videos of the journey along with all the warm and joyful moments along the way.

Title: Gift from Bridget
Content: Gift Box From Bridget: A brass diving helmet carefully preserved by Bridget. The area around the viewing window has rusted, but it doesn't conceal the glorous past of the deep sea explorer.

Title: Gift From Yata
Content: Gift Box From Yata: A omamori embroidered with a goldfish pattern. According to Yata, it is a magical accessory that bears the protection from twelve gods, suitable for all kinds of combat environments.

Title: Gift From Ishmael
Content: Gift Box From Ishmael: A triple prism pendant with fine cracks inside. It projects a pattern resembling a gray raven onto the surface when adjusted to a certain angle under light.

Title: Gift From Lilith
Content: Gift Box From Lilith: A tentacle ring with sucker-shaped details. Looks exquisite at first glance but radiates a mesmerizing yet perilous aura.

Title: Gift From Jetavie
Content: Gift Box From Jetavie: A nostalgic Golden Age walkman from Jetavie. It has a graffiti of a little devil showing its fangs on the surface and only one audio file in the storage.

Title: Gift from Chrome
Content: An assortment of fragrant chocolates has been neatly arranged in this gold-foiled gift box. You can feel the heartfelt gratitude of the sender, or... does it stem from something deeper?

Title: Gift from Sophia
Content: A somewhat crude-looking handmade chocolate. Fills your mouth with the dominating sweetness of date palms and camel milk, invoking even unfound nostalgia for the desert. To recreate such a stunning flavor in Babylonia, Sophia must have put in a lot of work.

Title: Gift from Vera
Content: Open it for a thorny and surprisingly spicy piece of chocolate. Pungency is a type of pain. How on earth did she manage to spice up chocolate? Must be a trade secret.

Title: Gift from Camu
Content: Open it for a massive hunk of chocolate. An explosion of different flavors compressed into one solid mass, a single bite will destroy your blood sugar levels and give you a multidimensional taste adventure.

Title: Gift from Lucia: Plume
Content: Beautiful Rose: An ordinary rose adorned with simple decor.  Without lavish colors, the modest red petals reveal the grace of simplicity and the soul who pursuits it.

Title: Gift from Vera: Rozen
Content: Thorny Rose: A thorn-covered rose, one must approach it with the utmost caution lest getting hurt by its prickles. Its stem, however, is intensely delicate, as intense as the piercing red of its petals.

Title: Gift from Camu: Crocotta
Content: Edible Rose: It appears to be a giant bag of snacks stacked as a tower, ready to be opened and enjoyed. Once emptied, a metal wire frame shaped like a rose can be found inside. Camu might want you to keep it.

Title: Gift from Rosetta: Rigor
Content: Cold Resistant Rose: Not as striking as other roses, its petals appear calm and composed, gleaming in a white and distant coldness. Frail as it looks, it is remarkably resilient even when removed from the soil.

Title: Gift from Noan
Content: Dark Aries Interview: An interview conducted by the WGAA news department regarding Dark Aries' third iteration. It was meant to put an end to the misconception about the "deserter squad"... but the results suggest that some things are better left unsaid.

Title: Gift from Bambinata
Content: Babylonia's Swan Lake: A new interpretation of the classic Golden Age ballet created by Bambinata and you. Dancing in front of the camera, Bambinata holds an immense sincerity with her tender imitation. This experience will perhaps become a beautiful memory that stays forever in your hearts, not easily lost.

Title: Gift from Bianca
Content: My Heart Goes Together: It includes the soundtrack of a famous romance movie during the Golden Age, from which you can feel Bianca's affection.

Title: Gift from Lee
Content: Fundamentals of Electronic Circuits - Video: An explanatory version of a textbook, recorded by Lee himself, with an accompanying explanation of what things Lee cannot create regarding the laws of physics.

Title: Gift from Ayla
Content: Earl Golden Age Aesthetics: Produced by the WGAA. The first—and best selling—chapter is narrated by Ayla.

Title: Gift from α
Content: Freedom: A landscape photo taken by Alpha somewhere on Earth. The pure white waterfall collides between the emerald green mountain streams, like an unknown paradise. It's amazing that such a beautiful scene can still be found on Earth today.

Title: Gift from Echo
Content: Echo's gift box: A refreshingly aromatic fragrance comes from the bouquet of neatly pruned Bluestar Tweedia that lies within the box. A line from a poem is elegantly inscribed on the box's wall, "It will whisper of the garden, you will understand."
